item.description:
Ihr seid eingeladen to Meetup together with other German speakers from all over the region. Meetupgruppen von Connecticut, Massachusetts und Rhode Island sind alle eingeladen. The afternoon will begin with an optional Spaziergang along a river rail trail followed by happy hour/dinner at the gourmet adorable Vienna Restaurant, all while enjoying German conversation.

 The restaurant should be lovely.  It's in an elegant old inn with fireplaces etc.  The Spaziergang starts at 1:30 along what was intended to be an extension of the Grand Trunk Railroad.  The train never came, but the land, river and trail are there for us to enjoy.

Then a gemütlich happy hour/dinner by the fire.

Sound nice? Please do try to join us.

 About the restaurant from their website  :

The original, more humble dwelling was built in 1812, then later, our Italianate Revival home which you see as Vienna Restaurant and Historic Inn.  The Mansion of 26 (8 bathrooms) rooms sits atop upper Main Street and is on the National Register of Historic Places.  Vienna's Inn has a 3-story mansard roof with meandering hallways and ceilings high enough to touch the heavens! While dining in our restaurant - don't forget to look up and see the gorgeous meticulously restored friezes on the ceilings, each of the 2 rooms has a different style. 

We serve each meal with villeroy and boch bone china, cotton table linen, real candle light and antique wood-burning fireplaces...~most important, real food & geniune hospitality! Be our guest.

 

We offer several intimate dining rooms for upscale fine dining.  All dining rooms are equipped with working fireplaces for warmth, tranquil, romantic atmosphere in all areas of the restaurant.  Vienna houses an extensive wine cellar featuring the wines of the world from Austria, France, Germany and South Africa to Austrialia with hundreds of labels to choose from.

The restaurant is quite proud to offer an accomplished staff with out the attitude.  Our guests should relax and experience warmth & hospitality beyond expectations. 

Specializing in Austrian and German cuisines as well as Hungarian, Polish, French and Swiss.  Even your dining companions who prefer a great juicy steak or seafood additions of the day- Our dishes are sure to please every palate. Vegan dishes available by advance request.
item.name: German Meetup Extravaganza
